channel.title: Getting annoying 12 year olds to leave you alone
channel.description:
I have found that the best way is to annoy them to death. Proof:
mandj10 (10:11:54 PM): just tell me why wintergreen985 (10:11:58 PM): idk mandj10 (10:12:03 PM): tell me wintergreen985 (10:12:10 PM): _idk_ mandj10 (10:12:55 PM): yes you do wintergreen985 (10:13:09 PM): i put the answer in my buddy info mandj10 (10:13:09 PM): theres 90% a reason for something mandj10 (10:13:57 PM): tell me in words that i know what you mean instead of away messages wintergreen985 (10:14:03 PM): look wintergreen985 (10:14:04 PM): in wintergreen985 (10:14:05 PM): my wintergreen985 (10:14:07 PM): buddy wintergreen985 (10:14:07 PM): info mandj10 (10:14:10 PM): i mandj10 (10:14:11 PM): did wintergreen985 (10:14:16 PM): and what did it say? mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM <3 wintergreen985 (10:14:37 PM): now what do most people take that as? mandj10 (10:15:06 PM): i dont know. wintergreen985 (10:15:10 PM): omg... mandj10 (10:15:34 PM): just explain it to me wintergreen985 (10:15:45 PM): GIVING OUT FREE _BLOCKS_ AFTER 10PM Random shit... wintergreen985 (10:17:26 PM): mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM wintergreen985 (10:17:33 PM): oh please just block me already mandj10 (10:17:46 PM): please tell me im not kidding wintergreen985 (10:17:58 PM): wintergreen985 (10:17:26 PM): mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM wintergreen985 (10:17:33 PM): oh please just block me already mandj10 (10:18:11 PM): why wont you tellme mandj10 (10:18:17 PM): im not kidding anymore mandj10 (10:18:20 PM): seriously mandj10 (10:18:30 PM): i cant handle you attitude with me mandj10 (10:18:37 PM): ANYMORE mandj10 (10:18:42 PM): just tell me mandj10 (10:18:47 PM): for the love of god wintergreen985 (10:18:53 PM): God* mandj10 (10:19:05 PM): tell me mandj10 (10:20:52 PM): mathew ian bovard. wintergreen985 (10:21:07 PM): Matthew Ian Bovard* mandj10 (10:21:08 PM): tell me mandj10 (10:21:18 PM): im sorry i forgot the other t wintergreen985 (10:21:22 PM): I like to be refered to as a person in the English language... wintergreen985 (10:21:33 PM): not three random words... mandj10 (10:22:54 PM): if you actually care about me you would tell me mandj10 (10:22:58 PM): how you feel wintergreen985 (10:23:08 PM): mmk wintergreen985 (10:23:12 PM): i feel tired... wintergreen985 (10:23:36 PM): umm wintergreen985 (10:23:43 PM): nachos... mandj10 (10:23:50 PM): about me wintergreen985 (10:23:55 PM): i'm in the mood for nachos... mandj10 (10:24:01 PM): stop being ignorant wintergreen985 (10:24:01 PM): BRINNG ME NACHOS! mandj10 (10:24:07 PM): im not kidding mandj10 (10:24:12 PM): seriously wintergreen985 (10:24:15 PM): I'm not either... wintergreen985 (10:26:52 PM): TROLL wintergreen985 (10:26:53 PM): TROLL wintergreen985 (10:26:55 PM): TROLL wintergreen985 (10:26:52 PM): TROLL wintergreen985 (10:26:53 PM): TROLL wintergreen985 (10:26:55 PM): TROLL
Your methods?

what about getting annoying 13 year olds off the forum?

(you)
[/quote]
I don’t know whether you were talking to me (jackass) but DDos works regardless of age.[/quote]
I think he was talking to m.dog, cuz his profile says he is 13.

item.title: Getting annoying 12 year olds to leave you alone
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I have found that the best way is to annoy them to death. Proof:

mandj10 (10:11:54 PM): just tell me why wintergreen985 (10:11:58 PM): idk mandj10 (10:12:03 PM): tell me wintergreen985 (10:12:10 PM): _idk_ mandj10 (10:12:55 PM): yes you do wintergreen985 (10:13:09 PM): i put the answer in my buddy info mandj10 (10:13:09 PM): theres 90% a reason for something mandj10 (10:13:57 PM): tell me in words that i know what you mean instead of away messages wintergreen985 (10:14:03 PM): look wintergreen985 (10:14:04 PM): in wintergreen985 (10:14:05 PM): my wintergreen985 (10:14:07 PM): buddy wintergreen985 (10:14:07 PM): info mandj10 (10:14:10 PM): i mandj10 (10:14:11 PM): did wintergreen985 (10:14:16 PM): and what did it say? mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM

<3
wintergreen985 (10:14:37 PM): now what do most people take that as?
mandj10 (10:15:06 PM): i dont know.
wintergreen985 (10:15:10 PM): omg…
mandj10 (10:15:34 PM): just explain it to me
wintergreen985 (10:15:45 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM
Random shit…
wintergreen985 (10:17:26 PM): mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM
wintergreen985 (10:17:33 PM): oh please just block me already
mandj10 (10:17:46 PM): please tell me im not kidding
wintergreen985 (10:17:58 PM): wintergreen985 (10:17:26 PM): mandj10 (10:14:25 PM): GIVING OUT FREE BLOCKS AFTER 10PM
wintergreen985 (10:17:33 PM): oh please just block me already
mandj10 (10:18:11 PM): why wont you tellme
mandj10 (10:18:17 PM): im not kidding anymore
mandj10 (10:18:20 PM): seriously
mandj10 (10:18:30 PM): i cant handle you attitude with me
mandj10 (10:18:37 PM): ANYMORE
mandj10 (10:18:42 PM): just tell me
mandj10 (10:18:47 PM): for the love of god
wintergreen985 (10:18:53 PM): God*
mandj10 (10:19:05 PM): tell me
mandj10 (10:20:52 PM): mathew ian bovard.
wintergreen985 (10:21:07 PM): Matthew Ian Bovard*
mandj10 (10:21:08 PM): tell me
mandj10 (10:21:18 PM): im sorry i forgot the other t
wintergreen985 (10:21:22 PM): I like to be refered to as a person in the English language…
wintergreen985 (10:21:33 PM): not three random words…
mandj10 (10:22:54 PM): if you actually care about me you would tell me
mandj10 (10:22:58 PM): how you feel
wintergreen985 (10:23:08 PM): mmk
wintergreen985 (10:23:12 PM): i feel tired…
wintergreen985 (10:23:36 PM): umm
wintergreen985 (10:23:43 PM): nachos…
mandj10 (10:23:50 PM): about me
wintergreen985 (10:23:55 PM): i’m in the mood for nachos…
mandj10 (10:24:01 PM): stop being ignorant
wintergreen985 (10:24:01 PM): BRINNG ME NACHOS!
mandj10 (10:24:07 PM): im not kidding
mandj10 (10:24:12 PM): seriously
wintergreen985 (10:24:15 PM): I’m not either…
wintergreen985 (10:26:52 PM): TROLL
wintergreen985 (10:26:53 PM): TROLL
wintergreen985 (10:26:55 PM): TROLL
wintergreen985 (10:26:52 PM): TROLL
wintergreen985 (10:26:53 PM): TROLL
wintergreen985 (10:26:55 PM): TROLL

Your methods?
